JOB DESCRIPTION:
Associate Business Analyst -  Internship -  Faveo Helpdesk Software Associate Business Analyst Internship Overview 

We are looking for interns to join our customer relationship department. A three- month programme will welcome you in the world of Business Analyst & Relationship management where you would be learning skills necessary to advance into a Client management role within Faveo Helpdesk.

Responsibilities 

 As an Entry level business analyst,  You ll be expected to capture complex processes and requirements from business experts in detail to form concrete,  practical requirements. You ll need to coordinate with management and IT team to further refine and develop solutions for these requirements 

End to End Account management of our existing customers 

 Understand the business need & gather requirements from clients. Create direct channels of communication to software and application developers that get the job done without managerial interjection 

Successfully dealing with the different point of contacts from the client and serving their requirements 

Perform account management related duties and ensure that all client deadlines are met 

Flawlessly execute end- to- end projects,  liaising with key internal and external stakeholders. 

Maintain regular communication with key accounts and annual correspondence with all customers 

Responsible for Service Delivery ensuring client retention and reference Qualifications 

Bachelor s or Masters degree,  professionals from technical background preferred. 

Awesome written & verbal communication skills 

Ability to form relationships with customers,  including being responsive and empathetic to customers needs 

Solid work ethic,  self- discipline,  persistence,  and ability to work independently and in a team 

Multitasking,  organizational,  and time- management skills 

Proactively keeps up to date on industry and customer specific issues 

Technical abilities to understand our products & client requirement 

Candidate with experience in CRM,  Helpdesk industry How can I apply 

Indicate the area of work that you are applying for 

Attach previous work or portfolio 

Regular cash/ gift monthly/ quarterly/ half/ annually incentives offered based on performance 

Complementary Hot Beverages and healthy Lunch provided at office 

Annual salary after internship 1, 20, 000 to 2, 40, 000 P.A CTC 

For Internship Stipend 5, 000 to 10, 000 CTC Per month 

Salary mentioned above will have deductions such as PT,  PF,  ESI,  TDS etc as per government regulations. In hand salary after deductions will be lower then the salary mentioned above. Detailed salary breakup is provided along with offer letter. 

Annual Incentive/ bonus based on yours & company s performance. Declared in March every year and credited in April 

Employee stock option available 

Exceptionally good interns may be offered permanent job opportunities depending on the needs of the organization 

We do not charge any fees/ money in terms of caution deposit or training charges or in any other forms from candidates Other details: 

We expect minimum 12 months job commitment from candidates. No relieving documents are issued to candidates leaving the job before the commitment period.

Salary hike,  appraisal reviews will take place annually in March every year. Annual salary hike will commence from April each year.
